subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Xavier Florencio was suspended from the Tour de France for using a substance containing Ephedrine amid more doping claims from Floyd Landis against Lance Armstrong.
snippet: Xavier Florencio was suspended from the Tour de France for using a substance containing Ephedrine amid more doping claims from Floyd Landis against Lance Armstrong.
